description: After a spaghetti bolognese recipe with a healthy twist? Try this version which uses zoodles, lean beef and sunflower seeds to tick all the boxes.
keywords: Bolognese,Zucchini,Seafood free,Mince,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Quick & easy lunch,Beef
name: Healthier Twist Bolognese With Zoodles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup basil leaves, finely chopped (plus extra leaves to serve)
500g Macro tomato, garlic & basil chunky pasta sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion, then cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until onion has softened. Add mince, seeds and basil, then cook, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 5 minutes or until mince has browned. Add sauce and 1/2 cup water, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Season with pepper.
Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of water to the boil over medium-high heat. Add zucchini and cook for 1 minute or until just tender. Drain well.
Serve bolognese topped with zucchini and extra basil.
